text: Dema is an unincorporated community in Floyd and Knott counties in the U.S. state of Kentucky. The community is located on Kentucky Route 7 south of Wayland. Dema has a post office with ZIP code 41845. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Floyd County, Kentucky Category:Unincorporated communities in Knott County, Kentucky Category:Unincorporated communities in Kentucky
title: Dema, Kentucky
